resources.string: Go to input method settings, enable NTL OneKey, then select it from the input method menu.

Version: VNAME
Â© 2018-2020 SIL International

NTL OneKey is freely distributable software created by the Dai-Han Bilingual Education Project, a joint initiative of SIL International and educational partners in Xishuangbanna Prefecture, Yunnan Province, China.

SIL Yunnan exists to serve minority language communities throughout China, in partnership with other institutional and individual stakeholders, through research, training, public advocacy, education, and materials development.

For more information about the Dai-Han BE Project and SIL International, please visit www.sil-yn.org or www.sil.org.

NTL OneKey is licensed under the MIT license and is based on the Keyman Engine for Android. For more information about Keyman, please visit keyman.com.
